mapper.select: SELECT user_coupon.*, coupon.coupon_title , coupon.price FROM user_coupon INNER JOIN coupon ON user_coupon.coupon_serial = coupon.coupon_serial
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_coupon(startdate, coupon_serial, userid, coupon_number) VALUES ( NOW(), #{coupon_serial}, #{userid}, (SELECT (SELECT coupon_serial from coupon where coupon_serial = #{coupon_serial}) || (SELECT trunc(random() * 999999 + 1)::TEXT) as coupon_number) )
